newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunkers steady, but seen rising on cargo.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunkers steady, but seen rising on cargo.

text.p: Singapore bunkers were quoted little changed from Tuesday but prices may rise Wednesday as buyers emerge to cover ahead of a perceived strong cargo market, traders said on Wednesday.
Bunker 180-cst was quoted between $123-$125 and 380-cst at between $119-$120, little moved from Tuesday's quotes.
"Enquires were slightly more from Tuesday's," said a trader. There were also some very prompt demand, said another trader.
"Some shipowners are rushing to cover as most expected cargo prices to rise later today," the trader said. MDO and gasoil was steady at $205-$210 and at $222-$228.
